name: ej2-aspcore-samples
description: Examples of ASP.NET Core UI Controls
author: Syncfusion Inc.

scripts.build: gulp generate-searchlist && gulp title-section && gulp aspcore-build --option EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET7.csproj && gulp aspcore-build --option EJ2CoreSampleBrowser_NET6.csproj && gulp desValidation && gulp sitemap-generate
